Add 9 new themes with liquid glass effects and improved menu system

This update introduces a comprehensive theming system with 9 total themes and significantly improves the UI/UX:

**New Themes:**
- Added 6 new liquid-style themes with rounded containers and 3D depth effects
- Blue Liquid, Light Liquid, Dark Liquid themes with enhanced visual depth
- Liquid Glass Dark (opaque), Clear (frosted), and Tinted (customizable) themes
- Tinted theme includes hue and saturation controls for full customization

- Removed "Invert Text Color" toggle (no longer needed)
- Fixed display menu overlay blocking folder interactions

**Menu System Enhancements:**
- Auto-wrapping filter toggles for better responsive layout
- Context-dependent pointer events to prevent invisible element blocking
- Wider, more readable menu items that adapt to content width

**README Updates:**
- Documented all 9 themes with descriptions
- Added details on liquid theme features and customization options
- Updated responsive design capabilities
